title: Documentation
description: The most important parts of the Startup Framework are Samples and the UI Kit that includes a set of different components. The samples consist of a set of 25 pages. Each of these pages you can use as-is or with new blocks from a UI Kit.

boxes.title: High Resolution
boxes.description: We did a 2.5K size high resolution photo that will suit even for a very large web site.

boxes.title: Easy to Use
boxes.description: Blocks fixed to 12 Grid system. It allows you to find understanding between the designer and developer.

boxes.title: Many Components
boxes.description: To get started, you select the desired sample and base the entire website on it.
